original_text: They washed the chariot at a pool in Samaria (where the prostitutes bathed), and the dogs licked up his blood, as the word of the Lord had declared.
korean_text: 그 병거를 사마리아 못에서 씻으매 개들이 그의 피를 핥았으니 여호와께서 하신 말씀과 같이 되었더라 거기는 창기들이 목욕하는 곳이었더라

sentences.original_text: They washed the chariot at a pool in Samaria
and the dogs licked up his blood
as the word of the Lord had declared
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주의 말씀이 선언하신 바와 같았더라
